description:
Our client in the entertainment accessibility space is looking for an Android Developer to join their team. This is a 100% remote opportunity (must be located in the United States) and is a 6 month, 1099 contract-to-hire.  
  
This company is a small startup, presenting the opportunity to work with a small, fast-paced team, creating solutions for their flagship Android application. This application allows people who do not speak English listen to a dubbed version of a movie (at the Theater, or with movies that donâ€™t have that accessibility).  
  
**Required Skills & Experience**  
  

-   4+ years of experience developing Android applications
-   Experience with Kotlin
-   Experience with Java

**Desired Skills & Experience**  
  

-   Experience using Coroutines

What You Will Be Doing  
  
Tech Breakdown  
  

-   100% Android

Daily Responsibilities  
  

-   100% Hands On

The Offer  
  

-   1099 contract-to-hire

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.  
  
**Posted By:** Nathan Noblitt
